name: Sapstring Bandage
short_summary: Quick-bind bandage used by wardens; speeds bleed recovery for road escorts.

name: Whisperline Travel Ration
short_summary: Portable ration loaf with sap glaze; steadies stamina on long treks.

name: Resin Patch Kit
short_summary: Pitch-coated patch and clamps; fixes torn harnesses mid-escort.

name: Ward-Chalk Packet
short_summary: Powdered chalk wrapped in wax paper; renews wardstone sigils.

name: Lowlight Shroom Tea
short_summary: Steeped shroom tea that clears night haze and warms patrolers.

name: Chorus Bridge Torch
short_summary: Resin-soaked torch that hums softly; brightens slippery bridges.

name: Thornbar Sling
short_summary: Rough sling preferred by smugglers; quick to load resin-shot pebbles.

name: Warden's Sapsteel Buckle
short_summary: Reinforced buckle issued by wardens; adds minor armor to patrol kits.

name: Smuggler's Knot Hook
short_summary: Hook with knotted grip used to snag packs or rope ladders in gullies.

name: Murmurstone Charm
short_summary: Stone bead etched with ward lines; dampens stamina drain near wardstones.

name: Rootsong Listening Horn
short_summary: Carved horn amplifies root-songs; used to align cairn grooves.

name: Bivouac Tent Stakes
short_summary: Stakes treated with sap pitch; anchors tents on slick bends.

name: Roadling Trade Token
short_summary: Stamped wooden token traded at mileposts for safe passage.

name: Crossing Guard's Satchel
short_summary: Satchel with extra lash points; keeps patrol notes dry in rain.

name: Tanglecut Hatchet
short_summary: Short hatchet for clearing saplings; doubles as light weapon.

name: Sap-Resin Salve
short_summary: Sticky salve sealing small cuts; resists sap-sting from striders.

name: Rivergrain Porridge Mix
short_summary: Travel porridge base carried by escorts; restores morale slightly.

name: Smudged Route Permit
short_summary: Forged travel paper with blurred seals; bribes some checkpoints.

name: Cairnkeeper's Beads
short_summary: String of warded beads gifted to those who mend cairns.

name: Coiled Line Spool
short_summary: Bundle of resin-braced rope for bridge work and snag traps.
